title: Azevedo
body: A family originating from Besteiros. Pedro Gonçalves de Azevedo proved his nobility in 1585, as a descendant of João Nunes Cardoso, lord of Besteiros.

Besteiros: Locality from which the Azevedo family originates

Pedro Gonçalves de Azevedo: Proved his nobility as a descendant of João Nunes Cardoso, lord of Besteiros

1585: Year in which Pedro Gonçalves de Azevedo proved his nobility
